title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor sizing issue in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com> wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly when used in a property sheet.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor should dynamically adjust its size to fit the content and display the available options without any truncation or overflow.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the property sheet in the application.
2. Click on a cell that uses the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the ComboBoxCellEditor does not size itself properly to display all the options.
